scripts.clean: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('rd /s /q .next .contentlayer 2>nul || echo Cleaned', { stdio: 'inherit' }) } else { require('child_process').execSync('rm -rf .next .contentlayer', { stdio: 'inherit' }) }"
scripts.dev: npm run contentlayer:clean && contentlayer dev && next dev
scripts.build: npm run contentlayer:clean && contentlayer build && next build
scripts.build:full: npm run fix:all && npm run contentlayer:clean && contentlayer build && next build
scripts.contentlayer:clean: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { console.log('Windows: Clearing Contentlayer cache...'); require('child_process').execSync('rd /s /q .contentlayer 2>nul || echo Cache already cleared', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('Clearing Contentlayer cache...'); require('child_process').execSync('rm -rf .contentlayer', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
